page.title: 06Cabus Village Hall
page.content: Without school or church,the village hall is the only community centre in Cabus and is very fully used.The Play-school meets Monday to Friday mornings.A flourishing Over-60's group meets on alternate Monday afternoons.The Parish Council meets monthly.Keep-Fit class meets on Monday evenings except in summer.Tuesday evening is Drama.Cabus Players usually produce 2 plays each season and have a good reputation in amateur circles. Wednesday_Women's Institute have a monthly meeting. Thursday_Badminton Club.Friday_fortnightly whist drives by the Hall Committee.Saturday_and alternative evenings are booked for Wedding receptions,parties and Jumble Sales.Soroptimists,Ladies Circle and Camera Club hold occasional functions.Management of the hall is by voluntary committee.
